description:
Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) to planning permission 223365FUL dated 15.02.2023 for "Conversion of existing building from 2no. flats into 9no. self-contained residential units; single storey, part 2 storey and part 3 storey, side/rear/side (wraparound) extension; creation of balconies and roof terraces to rear elevation; rear roof extension including increase in ridge height; alterations to fenestration; installation of front boundary wall; and provision of associated amenity space, car parking, refuse and cycle storage". Amendment seeks alterations to the size and positioning of rear fenestration;  level changes to side passage and repositioning of approved access gate; repositioning of windows and rooflight to south flank elevation, repositioning of windows to north
elevation; and provision of further detail in relation to construction methodology with reference to the front fa√ßade,
decision_conditions: The proposed non-material amendments to 223365FUL dated 15.02.2023 can be ACCEPTED as non-material amendments, in accordance with section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990), Government Guidance Greater flexibility for planning permissions (2010) and the Ealing Council Protocol for Non-Material Amendments following a grant of Planning Permission (2011).
